statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_data
SELECT customer_id, account_balance FROM customer_data WHERE account_balance > 1000
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_data WHERE waste_collection_day = 'Monday'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_data WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE waste_collection_day = 'Monday';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customer_data WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address, account_balance FROM customer_data WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, address, zip_code FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE waste_type = 'recyclable' ORDER BY pickup_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, waste_type, waste_weight FROM customers JOIN waste_collection ON customers.customer_id = waste_collection.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, city, zip_code FROM customers WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, city, zip_code FROM customers WHERE city='Los Angeles' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE waste_type='Recyclable' AND waste_weight > 100 ORDER BY pickup_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, address, city, zip_code, waste_type, waste_weight FROM customers JOIN waste_collection ON customers.customer_id = waste_collection.customer_id WHERE city='Chicago' AND waste_weight < 500 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE zip_code LIKE '9%' ORDER BY city, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CollectionSchedule WHERE collection_day = 'Monday';
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity FROM WasteBins ORDER BY bin_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity FROM WasteBins WHERE bin_capacity > 100 ORDER BY bin_location DESC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, WasteBins.bin_location, CollectionSchedule.collection_day FROM Customers JOIN CollectionSchedule ON Customers.customer_id = CollectionSchedule.customer_id JOIN WasteBins ON CollectionSchedule.bin_id = WasteBins.bin_id;

SELECT customer_name, bin_location, collection_day, collection_time FROM Customers JOIN CollectionSchedule ON Customers.customer_id = CollectionSchedule.customer_id JOIN WasteBins ON CollectionSchedule.bin_id = WasteBins.bin_id WHERE collection_day = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address, city FROM customers WHERE state='California';
SELECT bin_location, capacity FROM waste_bins ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date FROM waste_collection WHERE collected_weight > 100;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM service_history WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, city, state FROM customers WHERE state='California';
SELECT c.customer_name, w.bin_location, w.capacity FROM customers c INNER JOIN waste_bins w ON c.customer_id = w.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, wc.collection_date, wc.collected_weight FROM customers c INNER JOIN waste_collection wc ON c.customer_id = wc.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.feedback FROM customers c LEFT JOIN service_history s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id ORDER BY s.history_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_bins WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT location, last_emptied FROM waste_bins WHERE last_emptied IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%' AND phone LIKE '555%'

SELECT c.name, cb.location, cs.collection_day FROM customers c JOIN waste_collection_schedule cs ON c.id = cs.customer_id JOIN waste_bins cb ON cs.bin_id = cb.bin_id WHERE cs.collection_day = 'Monday' AND cb.capacity > 50

SELECT cl.log_id, c.name, cl.collection_date, cl.collection_status FROM collection_logs cl JOIN waste_collection_schedule cs ON cl.schedule_id = cs.schedule_id JOIN customers c ON cs.customer_id = c.id WHERE cl.collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'

SELECT cp.customer_id, c.name, cp.preferred_collection_day, cp.notification_preference FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN customers c ON cp.customer_id = c.id WHERE cp.preferred_collection_day = 'Friday'
